title: How to Bake a Blueberry Pie

steps.headline: Prepare favorite double crust pie pastry.
Mix blueberries lightly with other ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Pour blueberry mixture into prepared pie crust.
Cut slits in top of pie crust.
Bake about 50 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned.
steps.description: The blueberry pie filling will be bubble through the slits when the pie is done.

text: Preheat oven to 400 °F (204 °C).  Prepare favorite double crust pie pastry.  Mix blueberries lightly with other ingredients in a mixing bowl.  Pour blueberry mixture into prepared pie crust.  Top with remaining pie crust.  Crimp and seal.  Cut slits in top of pie crust.  Bake about 50 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned. The blueberry pie filling will be bubble through the slits when the pie is done. Finished.  Finished.
